t: Amazon’s new 'Buy for Me' feature helps customers find and buy products from other brands’ sites
s: April 3, 2025 - Buy for Me is currently live in the Amazon Shopping app on both iOS and Android for a subset of U.S. customers. t: CPSC Warns Consumers to Immediately Stop Using Certain Chinese-Made Faucets Sold on Amazon.com Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Infants, Young Children and Pregnant Women | CPSC.gov
s: The faucets were sold online at Amazon.com for between $30 and $70. Many of these faucets lack branding or other source-identifying labels, and lack safety certifications.

t: Baseus Portable Chargers Recalled Due to Fire Hazard; Sold on Amazon.com by Shenzhen Baseus Technology | CPSC.gov
s: Consumers should immediately stop using the recalled portable chargers and contact Baseus to receive a free replacement charger.
